summary: A configuration container that holds all hyperparameters and architectural settings required to build a Funnel Transformer or TFBert model, such as vocabulary size, block dimensions, hidden sizes, attention heads, dropout rates, pooling strategies, and initialization details. It inherits from a generic pretrained configuration class and supplies these values to the model constructor.
business_intent: Provides a flexible, reproducible way for developers and researchers to specify and modify the structure of Funnel Transformer models, enabling easy model instantiation, fineâ€‘tuning, and deployment across different environments.
